g.text: Made with ❤ by O PUI WAI (20198827)

div.p: Pikachu is helping his master to collect pokeballs! Help Pikachu to find the way home and collect all the pokeballs on the road. Help Pikachu to fight against monsters. Please note that the master will be unhappy if you cannot arrive on time. 😄
Use the N key to go left, the M key to go right and the Z key to jump.
Use the Spacebar to shoot and kill the monsters.
